title: Main Executor Flowchart
prompt: Create a comprehensive flowchart of the main trading executor loop. Start with 'Initialize' (load config, connect MT5, start Redis). Enter main loop 'Every 1 Minute'. Decision flow: 'Kill Zone?' → if No, 'Sleep'. If Yes → 'Fetch Data' → 'Apply Kalman' → 'Detect Regime' → 'Regime == SIDEWAYS?' → if Yes, 'Skip'. If No → 'Find POIs' → 'Check Entry Triggers' → 'Any Valid?' → if No, loop back. If Yes → 'Calculate Position' → 'Check Risk Limits' → 'Within Limits?' → if No, 'Reduce Size'. If Yes → 'Execute Trade' → 'Send Telegram Alert' → Loop back. Include 'Monitor Positions' parallel process. Error handling branch. Dark background (#0F172A). Color-coded sections for each layer. Detailed system architecture flowchart.
negative_prompt: too complex, overlapping arrows, hard to follow logic, inconsistent decision diamonds
